display_long_description:
VR Farming Tractor brings you the most immersive farming and tractor-driving experience in virtual reality. Drive powerful tractors, prepare fields, grow crops, raise animals, and build your dream farm in a beautiful countryside world. Enjoy smooth VR controls, interactive tools, and a relaxing yet rewarding farming journey.
[media]
Sit in the driver seat of realistic tractors, attach ploughers, seeders, trailers, and water tanks, and complete missions like ploughing, sowing, watering, harvesting, and transporting goods. Each tractor feels real with steering, levers, and VR-friendly movement.
[media]
Grow wheat, corn, rice, and vegetables through dynamic day–night cycles and seasonal changes. Plant, water, and watch your crops grow over time. Sleep to skip days and manage multiple tasks like farming and milk production together.

Care for cows, goats, sheep, and chickens. Feed animals, collect milk and eggs, clean barns, and earn coins to upgrade your farm. Unlock new fields, tools, barns, and tractor attachments as you progress.

Explore an open VR world filled with fields, rivers, barns, roads, and peaceful village views. Complete guided missions or relax in free-roam mode.

VR Farming Tractor is perfect for players who love tractors, machines, village life, and calm farming gameplay. Build your farm, drive your machines, and enjoy the most engaging VR farming adventure.



[media]
